scripts.logs: pipenv run chalice logs --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta > chalice.log
scripts.start: pipenv run cross-env TABLE_PREFIX=cff_dev AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda chalice local --stage dev --port=8001
scripts.deploy: pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta
scripts.deploy-prod: pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage prod
